comments:

If you are interested, I can send you the source code of my application (is very short).

Thanks in advance, 

Francesc Ros?s

Created an attachment (id=41994)
The application generating VE parser error project

Sri, please have a look. This is a serious bug for previously generated VE classes. Looks like a problem with getting an event structural feature in the EventDecoderHelper.
Thanks... Peter
The fix has been released to HEAD. Tested with a nightly build. Will be in VE 1.2RC2.
Closing now that VE 1.2 is released.
